entries.title_d: The Empire has started a major undertaking in the Endor system. They have not been forthcoming with details about what they are doing, but they have a need for materials and manpower. Storm Squadron has been placed in charge of system security. Your first mission is to escort a shuttle of engineers coming from the Yavin salvage operation through the Endor system.
entries.title: Endor System: Escort the Engineer's Transport
entries.thanks_5: Nice flying out there. Those Rebel fighters came out of no where. Almost like they were waiting for us.
entries.thanks_4: Nice flying out there. Those Rebel fighters came out of no where. Almost like they were waiting for us.
entries.thanks_3: Nice flying out there. Those Rebel fighters came out of no where. Almost like they were waiting for us.
entries.thanks_2: Nice flying out there. Those Rebel fighters came out of no where. Almost like they were waiting for us.
entries.thanks_1: Nice flying out there. Those Rebel fighters came out of no where. Almost like they were waiting for us.
entries.taunt_5: If we cannot capture the transport, our orders are to destroy it.
entries.taunt_4: That is the transport we are after. Focus all attacks on it.
entries.taunt_3: Don't make this hard on yourself. Hand over the transport.
entries.taunt_1: Hand over the engineers and the core and no one will get hurt.
entries.split_quest_alert: Another Engineer transport has been captured by Rebel pilots. Proceed immediately to last known location and recover the transport.
entries.shields_depleted: We just lost our shields! We are not going to last much longer unless you can get those fighters off of us!
entries.reason_5: Hello, pilot. We have the engineers and the core in storage. This should be a smooth flight.
entries.reason_4: Hello, pilot. We have the engineers and the core in storage. This should be a smooth flight.
entries.reason_3: Hello, pilot. We have the engineers and the core in storage. This should be a smooth flight.
entries.reason_2: Hello, pilot. We have the engineers and the core in storage. This should be a smooth flight.
entries.reason_1: Hello, pilot. We have the engineers and the core in storage. This should be a smooth flight.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the navigation waypoint of the arrival location of the shuttle. Wait for the shuttle to arrive.
entries.quest_location_d: You are to meet the engineers inside of the Endor system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the engineers through the Endor system to their destination. We don't expect any problems but if some arise, you are to take care of them.
entries.panic_5: Keep those fighters off our backs. We have to get these engineers to the staging area.
entries.panic_3: Why are the Rebels interested in this system?
entries.panic_2: We are under attack! You have to keep us safe.
entries.panic_1: Rebels! What are they doing in the Endor system?
entries.hull_half: Pilot, we are under heavy fire down here! Get those fighters off of me.
entries.goodbye_5: Thanks for the escort, pilot. I wouldn't have made it without you. These engineers are highly important to the Imperial operation underway here in Endor.
entries.goodbye_4: Thanks for the escort, pilot. I wouldn't have made it without you. These engineers are highly important to the Imperial operation underway here in Endor.
entries.goodbye_3: Thanks for the escort, pilot. I wouldn't have made it without you. These engineers are highly important to the Imperial operation underway here in Endor.
entries.goodbye_2: Thanks for the escort, pilot. I wouldn't have made it without you. These engineers are highly important to the Imperial operation underway here in Endor.
entries.goodbye_1: Thanks for the escort, pilot. I wouldn't have made it without you. These engineers are highly important to the Imperial operation underway here in Endor.
entries.found_loc: Coordinates confirmed and sent to your nav computer. Proceed to location and wait for the arrival of the transport.
entries.failed_protect: What are you doing leaving the transport out there on it's own. Your orders were to escort that transport through the system. Obedience is not an option! Report to your superior.
entries.failed_destroy: The transport has been destroyed. High Command will be most displeased with your performance. Report to your superior immediately.
entries.complete: Good work, pilot. You have successfully protected the Empire's engineers so they can begin work on a most important project.
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: Arrived at destination. Wait here for the arrival of the engineers' transport and escort it safely through the system.
entries.abort: High Command will hear about your failure in your duty, pilot.
